name: When Covid Attacks
description:
A simple infect-em'-up where you play as the notorious virus, and attempt to spread to as many people on the map as you can before time runs out. Use air currents to move across the map faster, and pick your targets well.

NPCs have defense scores that are based on the real life transmission rates, and by attacking them, you further whittle away at their defense, until you can infect them. Of course, just like in real life, that isn't the only factor that affects their defense. Wearing a mask grants them a significant boost in defense; and if they break social distancing, they put themselves at greater risk, thus further lowering their defenses.

Made for the Jamming The Curve jam.

Controls: 

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Left Click: Attack
